title: Ukraine-Russia War Live News and Latest Updates - The New York Times
content:
1. Ukraine-Russia War Live News and Latest Updates  The New York Times
  2. Ukraine claims its missile sank Russian warship in Black Sea  CNN
  3. Russia says Moskva cruiser has sunk after reported Ukrainian missile strike  The Guardian
  4. Russia's flagship Black Sea missile cruiser “seriously damaged” – BBC News  BBC News
  5. Fact Check-Clip shows 2013 Norwegian Navy exercise, not a Russian missile cruiser on fire in 2022  Reuters
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Ukraine says it hit the flagship of Russia’s Black Sea fleet with a missile strike. Russia says the ship was damaged by a fire and sank while being towed to port. E.U. leaders considered an oil ban despite its potential to increase energy prices around the bloc.
